startups.name: NYBE CryptoNext
startups.detail:
Every player can use the exchange to launch an ICO/IEO (primary market) or to buy/sell company's tokens (secondary market)
The exchange's owner earns 10% of the funds raised by each ICO/IEO, plus 5% fees on each token sold
